modShortDescription: Adds functional shields with a block function to the game, as well as an armor mod to hide them and a weapon mod that shows enemy life bar.
modDescription:
This serverside mod adds functional shields with a block function to the game, as well as an armor mod to hide them and a weapon mod that shows enemy life bar. In addition, some changes were made to weapons and [tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/), such as the handling under water. For more information have a look at the ingame diary.

## Steel Shield

New shield with block function (F). It costs stamina but protects the wearer. Perfect blocks costs less stamina.

## Hide Armor/Clothes

New cosmetic mod to hide [armor](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-armor-mods/) (clothes admin).

## Laser Scope

Shows enemy life bars when hit an enemy while the laser is active (F).

## Underwater

* Wielding [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) cannot be used.
* Shovels do increased damage to rocks.
* The range of firearms varies depending on the type.

## General Changes

* Changed colors of the quality levels (grey/white/green/blue/purple/orange).
* Reduced damage to safes with weapons and tools.
* Adjustable timer at C4.
* Decreased [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) body damage.
* Increased zombie head damage.
